sentences.sContent: Almost everyone knows the painting, Mona Lisa, but not everyone knows of its bizarre history.
sentences.sCn: 每个人都知道蒙娜·丽莎这幅画，可是并非人人了解她的离奇的历史。

sentences.sContent: And he painted her portrait--one of the great paintings of all time, right up there with the "Mona Lisa"--as a final, loving tribute.
sentences.sCn: 他还为她画了肖像，作为最后的爱的信物。 这张肖像一直被认为是一幅伟大的杰作，和蒙娜·丽莎齐名。

sentences.sContent: The true identity of Mona Lisa and her enigmatic smile have intrigued art lovers around the world.
sentences.sCn: 蒙娜丽莎的真实身份和她神秘的微笑令全世界的艺术爱好者为之着迷。

trans.tranCn: 蒙娜•丽莎（达•芬奇所作的一幅著名肖像画）
trans.tranOther: a portrait of a young woman painted by Leonardo da Vinci, admired for her enigmatic smile
